title: Aryan Nations recruiting again in northern Idaho
post_content: A Brief History: The Legacy of Aryan Nations  Aryan Nations came into being in the year 1974 from the efforts of our founder, the late Pastor Richard G. Butler. Aryan Nations was originally formed as the political wing of the Church of Jesus Christ-Christian; the latter organization being formed by the late Rev. Wesley Swift, one of the foremost proponents of the Aryan Identity message during the past century.  On a twenty-acre compound in Hayden Lake, deep in the forests of Northern Idaho, Pastor Butler began laying the foundations for an organization that would go on to become a major source of inspiration for thousands of National Socialists, Identity believers, survivalists and all White men and women who held pride in their genetic legacy as Aryans and who held within themselves the fanatical desire to strive for the territorial imperative of a future Homeland for White Aryans on the North American continent.  With an operating Church, meeting halls and outdoor facilities that became home to the annual Aryan Nations World Congress, the Aryan Nations soon became the prime nerve-center for the Aryan movement in the occupied United States.  Aryan Nations vigorous printing projects served (amongst other tasks) to cause the widespread dissemination of Aryan literature to incarcerated individuals - thus fomenting the radicalization of a large sector of White prisoners - much to the chagrin of the advocates of Zionist social control.  Aryan Nations also gained the widespread attention of the world during the early nineteen-eighties when several members of the Aryan Nations and Robert J. Matthews went on to form ??The Order??- a group that conducted practical acts of economic sabotage, assassination and other forms of covert direct action against the tyrannical and anti-Aryan Zionist system.  Aryan Nations became the focus of world attention again when - via a refused request to become informants for federal intelligence agencies working against the Aryan Nations - the Weaver family in the nearby town of Naples, Idaho suffered the tragedy that has become known as ??The Siege at Ruby Ridge??. The story need not be repeated here, yet those who do not know about this incident are recommended to study it as it has - and will continue to be - a flashpoint for many Aryan activists for many years to come.  In an erroneous lawsuit brought against the Aryan Nations by anti-Aryan forces, the organization lost the Hayden Lake compound and became more decentralized in nature. The Zionists soon realized that this was not to their benefit as it caused a great backlash with many leaderless members of the Aryan Nations taking action into their own hands after the diaspora from the Hayden Lake compound.  Aryan Nations World Headquarters was transferred to a ten-acre compound in rural Potter County, Pennsylvania, which was host to the 2002 Aryan Nations World Congress. During this time, soon before his death, Pastor Butler appointed Pastor Ray Redfeairn as National Director of the organization - the latter being an individual of cunning mind, violent tendencies and radical outlook who aided in the evolution of the Aryan Nations worldview as the organization moved into a future which was very different than that perhaps originally envisioned by the Aryan activists of past generations

title: Aryan Nations recruiting again in northern Idaho
post_content: ARYAN NATIONS----------Supporters and activists are our lifeblood!The message of white power must reach decent White people throughout the land in order to build a solid grass-roots power base.Your activism is the key element in this effort. You can spread the word by means of literature distributions. They are easy and low cost.(Prices for bulk rates are often below our own costs to print process and ship to you, so please add a donation!) You can operate as a lone wolf or with other activists.Each and every Aryan Nations member and supporter can distribute in excess of 100 pieces of literature per month with ease. You can tailor your efforts to your local needs and resources. Check out our Leaflets page.Literature distributions reach White people in two ways: directly (through the material itself) and indirectly (through resultant media coverage)... Again and again, even a small - but targeted - distribution conducted by a cunning lone wolf activist has resulted in front page newspaper and television coverage.This constructive activism is vitally important, great fun and highly satisfying!The first rule is to always remember our objective: We must persuade White people to support White Power! In order to do this, we must 1) let them know we exist, and 2) show them we promote White Power! We must all strive to favorably impress prospective White sympathizers... Not to simply annoy our enemies.(Therefore, we ask you to please be mature and resist the temptation of wasting our precious materials on our subhuman enemies! The object is to recruit our brothers and sisters. Anything else is a childish indulgence.)The second rule is to stay legal. In the United States we have legal opportunities undreamed of in most White countries throughout the world. If our side lacks the dedication, persistence and talent to make effective use of this legality, then it will certainly also lack the courage and the skill needed to win any imaginary "illegal, underground revolution".Always have plenty of literature handy. This will reduce those dozens of daily "missed" golden opportunities. After a short while distribution will become a part of your routine. Carry about a dozen copies in regular size plain manila folder, calling cards in your shirt pocket in a small plastic case. Everywhere you go you can just discretely drop off a leaflet or strategically place a calling card.(Important: Do not place in mailboxes.)Some favorite places to visit are libraries and bookstores.(You can do a lot here, because people are trained to mind their own business.) Go to the magazine rack and drop off two leaflets. Next go to the history book section. Select 5-10 different titles that will appeal to pro-Aryan Nations patrons. Casually browse and insert a calling card inside the book and put it back on the shelf. In a month or so repeat this procedure. Be sure to vary your time, dress and titles chosen. Note: Aryan Nations-minded people love history, military history, guns and biographies. Books about the Third Reich are the best.Truck stops, bus stations, train stations and airports are all excellent areas to drop off appropriate reading material. Simply walk through dispersing material on empty seats, benches or tables.Other fertile areas include county and state fairs, air shows, car/boat/gun shows, car races(NASCAR), etc. These events are attended primarily by Aryans who are not NEGRO lovers!!

title: Aryan Nations recruiting again in northern Idaho
post_content: In September 2000, the Southern Poverty Law Center won a $6.3 million judgment against Aryan Nations from an Idaho jury who awarded punitive and compensatory damages to a woman and her son who were beaten with rifles by drunken Aryan Nations security guards in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho in July 1998.[5][6] The woman and her son were driving near the Aryan Nations compound when their car backfired, which the guards misinterpreted as gunfire. The guards fired at the car, striking it several times, leading the car to crash, after which one of the Aryan Nations guards held the Keenans at gunpoint.[6][7]In February 2001, the group's Hayden Lake compound and intellectual property, including the names Aryan Nations and Church of Jesus Christ Christian, were transferred to the Keenans.[6] The Keenans sold the property to Greg Carr, a Southeastern Idaho philanthropist who donated the land to North Idaho College, which designated it a peace park.[6][8] The watchtower was demolished, and the church and meeting hall were burned to the ground during a firefighting exercise. Now tours are occasionally given on the property.[8] http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aryan_Nations

title: Aryan Nations recruiting again in northern Idaho
post_content: Former Aryan Nations Leader Sentenced for Drug Charges in ArizonaOn January 12, 2009, a Yavapai County Superior Court judge sentenced Justin Dwyer to 7.5 years in prison with no possibility of parole.Dwyer pleaded guilty to three felony drug counts of transferring drugs to minors, and one count of contributing to the delinquency of a minor on September 5, 2008. During that hearing, Dwyer confessed to supplying alcohol and cocaine to minors in his home.The sentence includes 7.5 years for the combined felony drug counts, and 180 days for the misdemeanor charge of contributing to the delinquency of a minor. Because the sentences were ordered to run concurrently, Dwyer will only serve a total of 7.5 years.The judge additionally ordered Dwyer to pay a $2,000 fine for each of the three felony drug counts.Dwyer, 41, a former leader in the neo-Nazi Aryan Nations, was a patrol deputy in the Yavapai County Sherriff's Office at the time of his arrest in May 2007.During the sentencing, the judge read the Yavapai County Sheriff's Office mission statement, telling Dwyer, "That's the spirit of what you violated."This is not the first time Dwyer has faced criminal charges related to actions taken involving his minor son. In 2005, while still a Yavapai County deputy, Dwyer pleaded guilty to one count of contributing to the delinquency of a minor for sexual actions and comments made to his son's babysitter.  http://www.adl.org/learn/extremism_in_the_new...

post_content: Aryan Nations came into being in the year 1974 from the efforts of our founder, the late Pastor Richard G. Butler. Aryan Nations was originally formed as the political wing of the Church of Jesus Christ-Christian; the latter organization being formed by the late Rev. Wesley Swift, one of the foremost proponents of the Aryan Identity message during the past century.  On a twenty-acre compound in Hayden Lake, deep in the forests of Northern Idaho, Pastor Butler began laying the foundations for an organization that would go on to become a major source of inspiration for thousands of National Socialists, Identity believers, survivalists and all White men and women who held pride in their genetic legacy as Aryans and who held within themselves the fanatical desire to strive for the territorial imperative of a future Homeland for White Aryans on the North American continent.  With an operating Church, meeting halls and outdoor facilities that became home to the annual Aryan Nations World Congress, the Aryan Nations soon became the prime nerve-center for the Aryan movement in the occupied United States.  Aryan Nations vigorous printing projects served (amongst other tasks) to cause the widespread dissemination of Aryan literature to incarcerated individuals - thus fomenting the radicalization of a large sector of White prisoners - much to the chagrin of the advocates of Zionist social control.  Aryan Nations also gained the widespread attention of the world during the early nineteen-eighties when several members of the Aryan Nations and Robert J. Matthews went on to form ??The Order??- a group that conducted practical acts of economic sabotage, assassination and other forms of covert direct action against the tyrannical and anti-Aryan Zionist system.  Aryan Nations became the focus of world attention again when - via a refused request to become informants for federal intelligence agencies working against the Aryan Nations - the Weaver family in the nearby town of Naples, Idaho suffered the tragedy that has become known as ??The Siege at Ruby Ridge??. The story need not be repeated here, yet those who do not know about this incident are recommended to study it as it has - and will continue to be - a flashpoint for many Aryan activists for many years to come.  In an erroneous lawsuit brought against the Aryan Nations by anti-Aryan forces, the organization lost the Hayden Lake compound and became more decentralized in nature. The Zionists soon realized that this was not to their benefit as it caused a great backlash with many leaderless members of the Aryan Nations taking action into their own hands after the diaspora from the Hayden Lake compound.  Aryan Nations World Headquarters was transferred to a ten-acre compound in rural Potter County, Pennsylvania, which was host to the 2002 Aryan Nations World Congress. During this time, soon before his death, Pastor Butler appointed Pastor Ray Redfeairn as National Director of the organization - the latter being an individual of cunning mind, violent tendencies and radical outlook who aided in the evolution of the Aryan Nations worldview as the organization moved into a future which was very different than that perhaps originally envisioned by the Aryan activists of past generations

title: Aryan Nations recruiting again in northern Idaho
post_content: Through diverse peregrinations and the wisdom that comes with age, the Aryan Nations has both taken a harder stance in regards to the means and methods by which our goals can reach fruition and have developed certain strategies which are more in tune with realism, as opposed to idealism.  Neither being inspired nor proud of the stagnation of the racialist ??movement?? in general, the Aryan Nations began taking strategic steps in a direction that would lead the organization into hitherto unexplored vistas in regards to our worldview and the implementation of that worldview.  In line with the facts of the geopolitical situation today, the Aryan Nations has come to the conclusion that the stereotypical ??race hate?? line of thought that has been so cherished (and so useless) within the ??movement?? is no longer viable - and as such, it is a line of thought that will no longer be perpetuated within this organization.  The goal of the establishment of a White Aryan homeland on the North American continent has not and shall not change. We believe that the Aryan folk deserve the right to a sovereign existence and racial self-determination within a territorial area characterized by our own laws, culture and customs. This is in line with the ??Blood and Soil?? concept of Third Reich-era National Socialists and follows the logic that for a people to survive (as a distinct racial and cultural group) they must have their own land so that their own ways can be furthered amongst their own folk - to the exclusion of alternate ways of life within that specific geographic territory.  But before this can occur, however, it is prerequisite and indeed necessary that ??the System?? be disrupted and broken down. This is the same ??System?? that not only oppresses Aryans but is also responsible for oppressing all persons of whatever race or nationality who oppose the erroneous, Judaic-based authority which is the premise for System-rule.  It is our intention to see Judaic-influenced society and governmental infrastructures to be pushed into a state of perpetual revolution: as is understood, no infrastructure can survive a state of perpetual revolution - and that is entirely the point in regards to the future of the current System?? A System which denies the basic human rights of millions of people across the globe and which specifically wages war against those individuals and groups who represent a spiritual-based, numinous way of living - and as such is the exact antithesis in competition to the hollow and empty life of a consumer-slave which is the default mode of existence in the present so-called ??Western democratic states??.  We know that there are far better alternative ways of living - and far more intelligent, reasonable and cultured means of society - which can be made real upon this earth for our people and for all people.  Where we differ from our predecessors is that we realize that it takes a cold-blooded, pragmatic and realist viewpoint to enact the changes which will be necessary to achieve our goals. As such we see - for the immediate future - a period where the spread of subversion and the aid of all forms which are a liability and are inimical in nature to the current Judaic-tyrannical state of affairs should be our principal aim.  We have encapsulated the quintessence of this work in two words: Aryan War??

We are not interested - nor do we intend to become - a petty debate club nor are we interested in the kind of problem-oriented futility which characterizes many of the non-mainstream political groups in North America. post_content: He's pulled me over on more than one occasion for speeding and deservedly given me many tickets. title: Longest-serving Santa Cruz traffic cop retires
post_content: Nice guy and a "good cop". He pulled me over once for running the light at Ocean & Water (you say red , I say yellow!).I parked in the County Center lot while he wrote up a citation. Practicing my newly acquired legal understanding of an "arrest" vs "a detention",I challenged him to quote the DMV statute that authorized him to"arrest" me for a traffic infraction (there isn't one).After a bit of a wait, he answered with "Can't find it but I know I can arrest you under the Penal Code for any crime!"After the writeup he asked me if I wanted him to move his motorcycle so I could leave (it was parked just behind me, blocking me in (good technique).So I said "Well, that's up to you, but when I pull out you might not like what happens to your bike."He replied "I don't think you'd want to do that.""Why?" I offered."Because then I'd have to shoot you!" Great sense of humour & a real gentleman.BTW I challenged the citation with a demurr and it was eventually dismissed when Officer Black didn't show for trial.Thanks, Ken Good Luck as a teacher!

title: Longest-serving Santa Cruz traffic cop retires
post_content: As ??Bob Hope sang,??Thanks for the memories????I??ve read all of the comments above, and have found them, at least, interesting. Many smiles and chuckles thinking back. My wife: Did you really do that?I can??t agree that I had a ??thankless?? job. Throughout the years, there have been many expressions of appreciation: people yelling or stopping to say thanks,??thumbs up??, and many smiles and all-fingered waves. Most got acknowledged, even if I couldn??t see you through the windshield.Most of us give what we get. My focus was safety. To reach that goal, there has to be communication and acceptance of information. That requires a certain level of respect. Part of the process was to take the time to explain what and why. The vast majority of the time, I was successful.I tried to give a break to the deserving: a lower speed, one violation instead of more, a cheaper one rather than a more expensive. Sometimes that wasn??t an option and sometimes there were those that convinced me they didn??t rate a break. One man recently even told me I should write him for things I hadn??t even noticed yet. After that, we parted with a handshake, on better terms than we met.Most of my contacts ended with a ??thanks (??Well, I really didn??t mean to say that, but????). Every contact had its own set of dynamics, some even lending themselves to a little humor (sorry you missed that,??real enemy??). Most were as pleasant as they could be, given the circumstances; a few had to be strictly professional.Clones? No, that was my evil twin on the other side of town.??Public service??- my philosophy of law enforcement. That does NOT mean, however, you get to tell me how to do my job.As a rookie deputy, I was fortunate to work with a couple of veterans who were a part of their community and imbued me with their philosophy.I won??t go too deeply into the pay topic. Suffice to say that the cost of retirement is part of the compensation package. About 10% goes into a fund managed by financial professionals. That amount is far greater than what many experts say should be put aside to provide for a certain level of retirement income.Most public employees contribute to the Federal Social Security program through other employment. However, many will not reap any benefit from the program, and the money goes to fund others?? retirement incomes.The patrol officers and sergeants at Santa Cruz PD postponed 5% raises and took 5% furloughs in order to increase the numbers of officers serving our community. Management took a 10% cut. None receive end-of-year bonuses or Christmas checks.I have, however, had to leave my wife??s birthday dinner and received telephone calls at home at 2:00 a.m. to go figure out how someone died. Want to work many hours alongside me as I reconstruct the accidents that took the lives of children and adults, pedestrians and motorists? Care to join me as I talk to the parents of a dead teenager who went to school with my daughter?More to follow.

title: Coroner identifies body found in Pogonip as Michael DiVerde, missing since July
post_content: Mike was a great friend and I loved the years of surfing and friendship I had with him. Knowing him well I was so sad to here the direction his life turned. He brought much fun and happiness to me and my friends I was at the same point he was at in our lives when we were in our early twenties. I feel truly blessed my life did not go down such a tragic road and ending. I only hope there are lots of great bowling a frames in heaven without a bunch of kooks he has to share with. Keep RIPping Diverde you are missed.

title: Coroner identifies body found in Pogonip as Michael DiVerde, missing since July
post_content: Hi all...just wanted to comment on some posts by friends and strangers alike. I was lucky enough to meet Mike in 3rd grade and become great friends with him up through high school. A tragic injury while we played football and hanging with the wrong crowd in Santa Cruz, I believe, led him down a path most would not take so willingly. Mike was well liked, he was "the man" as considered by myself and other very close friends. He was someone that I admired and competed with so I could be a better person. He came from a good home, thanks to his parents, brother, and close friends, and had all the opportunities, but like someone mentioned, we all have our demons that we fight, no matter how trivial it may seem to you, these challenges can mean the difference between happiness and saddness, success and failure, and in this unforunate instance, life or death. I will always remember the good times, jazz band, riding our bikes to school, jr. high dances, prom, our spanish video, football games, etc. Mike is someone who was loved and has a family, just like the rest of us...so at least show some respect, because in the end, we are all people, we are all human, and we all deserve respect in the end.God Bless you Mikey...may your soul be at rest and you'll be remembered by all of your family and friends. Your boy...BS

title: Coroner identifies body found in Pogonip as Michael DiVerde, missing since July
post_content: These comments should be a reminder that homeless people are not throwaways. They are sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, and sometimes fathers and mothers to loved ones. It takes a pretty horrible tragedy to wind up homeless---a job loss, an eviction, an illness, domestic violence, a messy divorce,a mental illness, etc. Many of these are beyond the person's control.Once homeless, a person is more prone to depression, isolation, and more likely to use drugs and alcohol.What is needed is compassion, supportive services, more drug and alcohol rehab, more job training, better medical and mental health resources, and more HOUSING!!Both subsidized and affordable.Money spent citing and arresting homeless people for BEING homeless is money MISSPENT!

post_content: It really amazes me that BECKY truly thinks that operating a camp, like the one she suggests, could be done simply with volunteers. Just look at her recent fiasco known as BumFest2010. Imagine a camp with 300-500 people, or more. Can you imaine to number of volunteers just to watch the bathrooms? And who would organize them 24/7/365? Someone would practically have to volunteer full time just to organize the volunteers. What about trash? Security? Daily clean up? Showers? It's now looking like a huge number of volunteers.I know. She'll say that the people staying there will perform some of these functions. But if that's the case why did it take BECKY, Ed, and Robert to simply watch the bathrooms? She basically said the campers couldn't monitor it themselves.Then there's the liability issues. Can you imagine what kind of insurance it would take to safeguard the city should something happen? Just imagine the city manager trying to negotiate an insurance contract on a plot of land where drunks, drug users, people with outstanding warrants, possible arsonists, people on sex offenders lists, etc. would be gathered. I know what the cost is for a small office, and this would be through the roof.And speaking of things happening. What if something goes wrong and someone gets injured or, God forbid, worse? BECKY was practically apoplectic when a volunteer group forgot to put salt and pepper on her table during a free dinner. Just think of her reaction if something worse than a loss of condiments happened. History proves she will be one of the first people to demand an investigation and place blame. And let's be clear, BECKY has shown her level if dedication towards volunteering for such things. Despite saying she would sleep every night at the courthouse until their demands were met, she hung out a few hours some nights. Just as she couldn't bother to volunteer for the homeless census, I highly doubt she would be volunteering much of her own time for such an endeavor. BECKY has already wailed when a volunteer group of hundreds forgot her condiments, butter, and coffee for a one night gig. Does she really think she could get enough volunteers together to pull off an equally daunting task, completed to her level of satisfaction, 365 days a year.She's clueless.

post_content: Craig wrote:   <quoted text>Hey Karen, I keep reading that the majority of crimes against homeless individuals are actually committed by other homeless folks. Do you have any insight   I can't comfortably say that the majority are because I don't have any stats to back that up with. There wasn't much at all of a gang problem in SC back then and I don't think that meth was quite so rampant in the youth population so that might have changed things in terms of hate crimes. For the most part they don't have anything to steal that's worth anything to anyone but another homeless person. When someone housed attacks a homeless person it's usually because they want to harm them, not rob them. When the community gets up in arms about the issue there are always more incidents of trollbusting, usually by teenagers. That happened at least a few times a month to the older drunks or the mentally ill people that go around yelling at random strangers.That said, I spent every morning listening to tales of who did what to who and who I had to go out and make give their stuff back or yell at for punching them. The junkies would steal anything that wasn't nailed down if they could get away with it and sometimes they even stole people's shoes right off their feet while they were sleeping. The drunks and meth users annoyed everyone so much that if they weren't starting a fight themselves someone else was punching them to get them to shut up. It wasn't like they were out there maiming and killing each other (with some rare exceptions) but if we called every punch thrown an assault the crime stats sure would jump up. It's a difficult situation because it's really dangerous to get labeled as a snitch on the street. They don't usually call the police on each other because they would get beat up for it later.* "Troll justice" works fine for the tougher guys but the mentally ill and loners get victimized all the time because they aren't strong enough to get their stuff back or fight to keep it. For the most part a relatively small number of people in the campground caused the vast majority of the problems. We called them the crankster gangsters and they scared me too but I couldn't show it or I would have been toast. Even now I would be afraid to post where their camps are. The monitors didn't stand a chance of controlling that level of graft and drug sales.* The exception being sex crimes in which case even the roughest guys with loads of warrants would come in and tell the cops everything that they knew about who did it.

Graduate/grad school is a proper term and is defined as a "school that awards advanced academic degrees (i.e. master's degree, MBA, Ph.D.)". Certificate programs, relatively new to colleges and universities, started appearing in colleges and universities back in the 1970s/1980s. They are specialized skills programs that involve several courses that result in a certificate rather than a full degree. Common usage of the phrase "I finished/completed grad school" takes on the meaning that you successfully attained the advanced degree, NOT that you have received a certificate. Using YOUR logic, if you drove through the Princeton Campus, you'd declare to one and all, that you "went to Princeton".

Some people use it to get on their feet and some take advantage of it but it's there for a reason. I don't know where Becky fit into that scale. My mom decided to get a job instead but there are certainly consequences associated with having 3 young latchkey kids too. I sure could have used some more daytime supervision but she didn't have a lot of options.(Sorry, but the advocate in me still exists even when it's Becky.)

Legitimacy is defined at birth. If the parents are married, the child is deeemed legitimate. If the parents are unmarried, the child is deemed illegitimate. So to answer your question, by definition, the child is still "illegitimate". The legitimation process is not used to change the status of the child's birth (that cannot be undone). title: Robert Norse: City Council silencing dissenting voices
post_content: Becky Johnson wrote:   DONNY B (WHO IS SO PARANOID HE ROUTES HIS ISP THROUGH VIRGINIA, LEST SOMEONE TRACK WHO HE REALLY IS) WRITES:...   I know that this is geeky but it's driving me nuts. Becky, I'm going to explain this step by step because I'm not sure what part it is that you don't understand. If you don't get it please ask a question so that you don't keep making this mistake.We all use something called an ISP, or internet service provider. There are lots of those, like Comcast cable internet service, SbcGlobal DSL, Cruzio, and countless others. You chose an ISP to give you internet access. Their job is to move your data from your computer to the place where you want it to end up. To do this they use something called a server which in this case is essentially just another computer dedicated to moving internet traffic around. That means that when you hit enter your message goes through phone or cable lines to at least one server* which then sends it on to Topix. A big ISP might route your data through any number of servers before it ends up here on Topix but a small one like Cruzio has its servers right here in town. The location that Topix shows is not the place where you are sitting at your computer, it's the place where the last server that got used is located. It can change from time to time depending on how your ISP works. If you look at my location it usually says Sebastopol even though I live in Bonny Doon because the ISP that I use sends my data to a server in Sebastopol before moving it on to Topix. Every now and then you'll see my location change to some other place because my ISP is routing things differently that day but I'm still sitting at the same computer in BD. If I take my laptop downtown and use free wireless at a coffee shop then I'm using their ISP and my location would change to wherever that server is. Does this make sense?The tl;dr version is that our messages travel from our computers to a brief stop at a server located someplace else and then on to Topix. If you aren't registered the location that is shown here is the address of the server someplace else. Does that make sense to you?*If your home machine is a server then it gets simpler but I'm sure that yours isn't one.

title: Robert Norse: City Council silencing dissenting voices
post_content: FOR ALMQUIST AND BASKETT to find us guilty they needed to:1. Believe ONE eyewitness over SEVEN2. IGNORE that the day before we posted an announcement that our event WOULD START at 1:30PM3. IGNORE that REILLY was so uninformed of who was actually playing music he arrested his neighbor by accident4. IGNORE that one defendant, Blindbear, didn't sing a word5. Be convinced that REILLY heard us sing for four hours straight but was someone magically unable to hear any of the lyrics to our songs6. IGNORE witnesses who said our music was ordinary, of a normal volume, unamplified, not continuous, and not overly loud7. Completely ignore our 1st amendment rights8. Ignore that he failed to point out the keyboard player9. Ignore that he failed to point out the man who sang the loudest10. Ignore that REILLY never testified he saw or heard ME singingFrankly, this "verdict" is a slam against our entire justice system. It exposes our judges as being petty, personal, and acting in collusion with the desires of the DTA.To quote CHIEF JUSTICE ALEX KOSINSKI of the 9th circuit court of appeals when talking about City leaders in Santa Cruz: "Councilman Fitzmaurice clearly wants Norse expelled because the "Nazi salute" is "against the dignity of this body and the decorum of this body" and not because of any disruption. But, unlike der F??hrer, government officials in America occasionally must tolerate offensive or irritating speech.Once we get outside the inbred, wink-wink, nudge-nudge, "justice" system our backwater, compromised, and corrupt local courts, I am confident justice will prevail. The feds don't care who the Judges golf with.

HERE is the EXACT LANGUAGE of the SCPD press release, May 12, 2008 which NORSE posted on Indybay where you can still read it: http://www.indybay.org/newsitems/2008/05/10/1... INFORMATION: On May 9, 2008, at 4:51 p.m., Santa Cruz Police Department officers responded to reports of several people smoking marijuana in the parking lot at W Cliff Dr and Columbia St. Officers contacted the group and requested identification. One suspect, later identified as Dawnna Deiss, ignored an officer??s repeated request and walked away. When the officer attempted to detain Ms. Deiss, she threw a cup of hot liquid onto his face. Despite being burned, the officer was able to control and eventually take Ms. Deiss into custody. Ms. Deiss was treated and released from Watsonville Community Hospital for injuries she sustained during the arrest.In the course of this incident, another suspect, later identified as Linda Allen, attempted to conceal evidence by placing two glass marijuana pipes in a nearby trash can.Ms. Deiss was arrested on charges of battery on a peace officer, resisting arrest, and possession of marijuana. Ms. Allen was arrested on charges of destroying evidence and possession of marijuana.BECKY: So LEMOSS admits she was treated and released for injuries she sustained during the arrest. So yes, he INTENDED to break her arm. He justifies doing it by claiming HE was ATTACKED by HER.He claims the coffee was a "hot liquid" which "burned" him. Neither she nor he were treated for burns from any "hot liquid".(DONNA says it was lukewarm).NOTE that she was convicted of NONE of these charges and the CITY paid her a settlement. Oh, and the lot where it happened has been punitively posted with a 20 minute parking limit.So I think it's likely she was telling the truth and this press release is a pack of lies.

post_content: Cops and Courts: May 11, 2010Suspected drug dealer arrestedOfficers patrolling a new walking path under highways 1 and 9 on Sunday night caught a suspected drug dealer armed with a "makeshift blackjack," Santa Cruz police reported.Bryan Young, a 26-year-old transient on probation, allegedly had methamphetamine and the blackjack -- a short leather-covered club, with a heavy head on a flexible handle -- when the officers stopped him along the San Lorenzo River levee around 8:20 p.m., according to police spokesman Zach Friend.Police suspect Young had been selling drugs near the homeless shelter on Coral Street. Because he is on probation, officers searched him and found methamphetamine in a Ziploc baggie and the weapon, Friend said.Young was arrested on suspicion of a probation violation, possessing a controlled substance with intent to sell and possessing a dangerous weapon.

Most are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families like we all are. What is going to have to take place is the surgical removal of the gang culture to it's core. It can be done. We took in a friend of my son who could have gone down that road and was straddling the fence between gang life. He lived with us his last year of high school (Aptos). His father moved back to Calexico and his mother to Chicago. College was not for him yet so four years in the Navy later, he began college and is now armed with a degree in engineering instead of a gun. Some of his family who could not take him is have come over during the years to thank us. Yes George Aguilar, if you read this, we're really proud of you for doing what you have on your own on your own terms. You know you always have a home here and you'll always be family....

post_content: Some Tips To Avoid Gang Violence  DON'TS  Don't associate with gang members or "wannabe/gonnabe" gang membersDon't identify with or communicate with gang membersDon't hang out near or where gangs congregateDon't approach strangers in cars who appear to want information or directionsDon't wear gang-related clothing where gangs are known to gather or traverseDon't wear initialed clothing Don't use words like "Crab" or "Slob" (localized lingo may develop) anywhere gangs may be - i.e., malls, sporting events, etc.Don't attend parties or social events sponsored by gangs or their associatesDon't take part in any graffiti activity or hang around where graffiti is presentDon't use any kind of finger or sign language in a public placeDO'S If you are threatened by gang members, don't overreact. Inform them that you have no argument with them. If the threats continue, make sure you notify your parents as well as the police and/or the school resource officer.Get involved in activities - sports, school clubs, a part-time job, volunteering, after-school programs.Set goals for what you want to accomplish in life. Establish neighborhood watch groups.Zero tolerance for gangs.

post_content: There are plenty of kids in our schools who ARE wearing gang colors and parents who seem to be unaware (and very defensive when they are told about it) that the clothes they are buying their kids may target them for violence. What can parents do? Well, there are a number of things:1) Take your head out of the sand. Santa Cruz has a gang problem. Lots of people in town want to believe the gang problem is only in Salinas; well, they are wrong. Also, gangs are not just a "Latino" thing. The last two kids on the westside who were murdered were white and many of the westside wannabes are white.2) Educate yourself about local gangs, their signs, colors and neighborhoods. Gang dress changes over time and you have to stay current. Google Santa Cruz, CA gangs and you will find a number of websites to learn about them.3) Don't buy your kids gang-identified clothes. When rival gangs cruise a neighborhood looking to make trouble with the local gang members they look for the people who LOOK like they are in the gang. They don't check ID. They are often high and often stupid; they just pick someone who looks like they are in the rival gang. So, don't let your kid out of the house looking like a gang member. What does that mean? On the westside it means wearing red shirts, hats, shoe laces, Nor-Cal, W/S or Westside wear, red bandanas or belts, the number 14; on the eastside it means blue shirts, hats, shoe laces, South Pole, 13, ESSC. And support your kid's school if they call to tell you your kid has gang-related clothing on, don't argue with them that your kid isn't gang involved. But gang clothing and accessories change frequently, so you have to be vigilant. 4) Know where your kid is, who they hang out with and what they are up to. Yes, this might mean you actually have to snoop around a little. Teenagers don't usually want their parents to know everything about them. Search their rooms, look on Facebook, check out the texts in their cell phone. Look at the graffiti on their notebooks. Be involved. They need you to protect them and confront them if you find anything suspicious. 5) Just because you know your kid is a "good" kid doesn't mean he isn't going to be targeted by gang members. If your kid looks like a gangster, acts like a gangster, is in the places where gangs hang out and is hanging out with gang-affiliated people, he is at risk. Add alcohol and anything can happen. Yes, drunk teenage boys yell things and confront people inappropriately, and when it escalates it can be life-threatening. 6) Write to your city council members and other legislators to tell them you want gang-related juvenile offenders DETAINED in juvenile hall. Santa Cruz Co juvenile hall detains fewer juveniles than any other probation department in the state; they brag about it, get awards for it, calling it "restorative justice". The reality is that the policy of not detaining violent gang-related offenders allows them to remain in the community where they commit more crimes. Let the officials know you are tired of this policy and that you want gang-identified offenders detained so that our communities can be safer.

post_content: Some misconceptions out there. Very few W/S gang members are surfers. Maybe 20%. There was a time when it was a surfer thing but not any more. And not all W/S members are white, not all are Latino, it's a mix. Some of these kids have fathers who were gang affiliated, some just claim the gang because it gives them status with their peers. Negative status, especially for teenage boys, is preferable to no status at all.In all the years I have worked with gang kids, through many awful, violent unfortunate instances, including a number of homicides, the family NEVER admits that the kid was in a gang. That's just how it goes. I don't know if it's because of denial, not wanting to speak ill of the dead, or feeling guilty about not intervening, but the family ALWAYS says how great their kid was and that he was not in a gang. That includes kids who have been arrested over and over for gang crimes. So the fact that the family says the kid wasn't in a gang doesn't make it so. Some families have no idea what their kids are up to because they are so permissive or believe so strongly in their kid's privacy that they don't have a clue. Think Columbine. ColbyWednesday Dec 11th, 2013 12:15 PMRR:You may have some legitimate issues with Robert Norse (which aren't necessarily personal ones but grounded in your beliefs about his actions).I am writing as a free agent who isn't a HUFF member. I am an unaffiliated representative and advocate for disabled and homeless people. I conduct independent research (often using public records requests) to gain information to aid me in advocating with the government and leveraging the media to ensure the problems of those I represent are solved.Speaking from my own POV, Norse has been very helpful to my advocacy. Listening to his radio shows, I often come across issues which raised my own questions (leading to me seeking answers to them through FOI requests and personal research). Norse has generously offered to (partly) fund my FOI requests for the disabled and the homeless. This is very helpful because currently I have limited resources ?? his support is aiding me help a lot of people and uncover government corruption.My take on Norse's journalism is that while it is not completely objective ?? but then who really is ?? often his interviews are illuminating and quite informative. For example, his questioning of the recent alleged victim of SCPD aggression was a good interview. Since I am an experienced interviewer ?? I often interview homeless people who can be difficult to gain useful information from ?? who passes the evidence I gather to federal and state agencies, I believe Norse's interviews, although sometimes "chatty", are generally of good quality.Although I don't always agree with Norse's approach to advocacy for the homeless, he has passed victims of discrimination to me and seems to genuinely care about them.RR: hopefully we can agree to disagree. I appreciate you commentary which is often very astute. post_content: Just saw these gems from Jimmy Spring.....he said this four days ago....."A few observances when I've spent time in Scandanavian (*- Finland, while lumped in, don't necessarily consider itself Scandanavian) countries:""1) Work is respected, be it blue collar or white collar. In general, contributing to the society at large is respected.2) The discrepancy between what the average worker makes and what the top brass makes has less of a multiplier than we do here.3) Fines for transgressions like speeding are sometimes tied to your income.""Overall, there is a general respect towards contributing to the common good, a respect towards work, and an emphasis on what is best for the community as a whole.""Holding them up (and their very good infrastructure) against the US is a bit of a fallacy on two extremes - on the economic end, the extremes are much more extreme; on the social end, the individuals with reliance on the social system are also more extreme (as we have seen in some other conversations here).""Not sure how to get over the extremes in this country, but "give me" and "fuck no earn it" don't really overlap. A more common ground needs to be found." https://www.facebook.com/groups/CFABSC/permal... Jimmy Spring is really obsessed with discrediting low income locals to Santa Cruz.

title: Archive for Jim Spring posts
post_content: John Colby wrote:   <quoted text>I truly am an obsessive crazy loon who stalks multitudes.....and I don't care whether they are even real!   While I do not care for those people and the drama that they bring to forums and real life individuals, the use of his name as an account with the blurbs about him is a horrible way to troll them. Over time I've thought, "They can't be here trolling these other people, look at the responses they are receiving and it is never ending." Lately, I've realized that you all are right about their participation on these forums. Why would anyone feel harassed, bullied, or hated on unless they were here as willing participants that egg the negative posts on so they have some sort of justification for their "feelings"? I wouldn't be on a website trolling people that repeatedly post information about me that I do not want them to share (and claim are all lies), so why in the hell would their "friend, associate, admirer" continue the drama? Last night, I looked at Mr. Akey's Facebook page out of curiosity after reading DBS's remark that they had some choice words about Mr. Colby. Those people do not look like drug dealers, haters, evil meth users, sexual deviants, or any of the other accusations. You can see they have lots of friends, they make posts about their religious beliefs, they have a child (beautiful woman too), and I remember them when I used to shop at Mission St. Safeway years ago. I've tried to understand this drama as an outsider looking in, and I have a hard time believing some of the accusations from both sides. The proof of who is a stalker, who is a troll, who attacks people, and who saves information about hundreds of citizens and continues requesting information about their communications is all on one guys online google site.
